item.title: Clay confirms it closed $100M round at $3.1B valuation
item.description: The AI sales automation startup raised fresh funds, led by CapitalG, just months after its last round.

item.title: For the first time, OpenAI models are available on AWS
item.description: This is a juicy competitive move for both companies after AWS faced an onslaught of criticism over its progress with AI.

item.title: Linda Yaccarino joins health tech platform eMed as CEO after leaving X
item.description: Though Yaccarino does not have experience in health tech, eMed said in a press release that they sought her out for her "undeniable ability to negotia...

item.title: Substack rival Ghost connects to the open social web with its latest public release
item.description: While the ActivityPub integration is a main selling point for Ghost 6, this major release includes a number of other changes and new additions.

item.title: OpenAI launches two ‘open’ AI reasoning models
item.description: For the first time in more than five years, OpenAI is launching a new open language model that appears to be state of the art.
